content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position 117.5, -30.5), boiler(position 111.5, -32.0) and offshore pump (position 107.5, -33.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 60.0, -60.0) and a furnace at position(60.0, -60.0)
-  Burner inserter (position 60.5, -61.5) 

### Copper cable factory
No factory found

### Belt group at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of two belts at positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using inserter but having no items to insert
 -  Make sure to have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them
### Errors when boiler or steam engine is not working correctly
 -  Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel and the steam engine is connected to the boiler
### Errors when inserter has no source items
 -  Ensure that the inserter has a source of items to insert
### Errors when offshore pump is not working correctly
 -  Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a pipe and has a fluid box

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined. 
Important variables assigned:
* `coal`: int
* `copper-ore`: int
* `iron-plate`: int
* `copper-plate`: int
* `copper-cable`: int
* `iron-gear-wheel`: int
* `transport-belt`: int
* `small-electric-pole`: int
* `pipe`: int
* `stone-furnace`: int
* `wood`: int
